name: Associazione Nazionale Educatori Professionali
membership:
ANEP aderisce al Coordinamento Nazionale Professioni Sanitarie- www.conaps.it 
http://aieji.net/
goal:
ANEP aims to represent the Professional Educators, to support the organization, development and protection of the profession.
Has among its main objectives to achieve legal recognition of the figure as a Professional Educator Profile expendable in all sectors, with a single training base.
ANEP promotes the cultural debate and research for the development of the profession.
To achieve these aims maintains constant relations with public institutions and training and participates in the international cultural debate on the issues of the profession
interests: Competition, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Youth
